intro: Vogtia annua, commonly known as the annual vogtia, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in grasslands and open areas, thriving in temperate climates. Its flowers are usually yellow or orange, with ray florets surrounding a central disk. Vogtia annua is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
